channel.title: God sword stances help!
channel.description:
i have a few sources, i saw in one of them the sword is held "almost" like in rs, and i have a fav source, i want to make the other source to be able to have the same stance? wer would i edit this and change what? tyyy asap plsss
PS: IF U CAN POST A CODE AND SAY WERE TO POST THIS AND WUT TO DO tyyyyyyyy

item.title: God sword stances help!
item.dc:creator: @Happyman Happyman
item.description:
@Happyman wrote:

in public int GetStandAnim(int id)
add:

if(id == #### || id == #### || id == #### || id == ####) //Godsword { return 2273; }

replace the #### with the four id’s of the godswords

Read full topic
